text: Antonis Petris (born 13 November 1958) is a Greek equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Greece Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2009 Mediterranean Games Category:Sportspeople from Nicosia Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in equestrian Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Greece
title: Antonis Petris
